revised_title: The Hybrid and Parent Forms of Echinoid Larvae: A Study of Evolution and Transmission of Parental Characteristics
tldr: This study investigates the relations between hybrid and parent forms of echinoid larvae, focusing on the conditions under which hybrids are produced and the morphological relations between parent forms and their hybrid progeny. The research examines the transmission of parental characteristics and prepotency in the animal kingdom, using certain Echinoidea species as a suitable model.
